Title: Reimburses counties who have purchased or will purchase Medicaid fraud detection software
Summary: Reimburses counties who have purchased or will purchase Medicaid fraud detection software.
LawCode: Amd ยง368-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the state reimbursement of county payments for medical assistance fraud, waste and abuse detection software
